name: StatsGroups
descr:
StatsGroups estimates statistics (occ, mean, stdev, intercep and
slope) on sequences of numerical intervals.

options.text: Name of the tier with the numbers: (required)
Name of a tier with the time segments: (optional)
Estimate the number of values in the intervals.
Estimate the mean of the intervals.
Estimate the standard deviation of the intervals.
Estimate the intercept and the slope of the intervals.
